title: 2009/577/EC: Council Decision of 27 July 2009 appointing one Spanish member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
30.7.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 198/56
COUNCIL DECISION
of 27 July 2009
appointing one Spanish member of the Committee of the Regions
(2009/577/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Spanish Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Manuel CHAVES GONZÁLES,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as a member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
Mr José Antonio GRIŇÁN MARTÍNEZ, Presidente de la Junta de Andalucía.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 2009.
For the Council
The President
C. BILDT
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
